title: Loopstudio landing page
description: This is a simple responsive landing page build with html, tailwindcss and a bit of JS for the mobile menu.

title: Hulu Clone
description: This is a rebuild of a Hulu movie site. This project is built using the TMDB API and showcase movies based on categories with details on each movie.

title: Rest Countries Search
description: This is a SPA who displays countries and details about each of them. Dark Mode and country filtration are also included

title: Calculator App
description: This project is a simple calculator app with color theme switching
